attributes.action: Provide all pensioners born before April 1951 with the new State Pension
attributes.additional_details: We are expected to survive on less than other pensioners. We would like the same pension entitlement as people who receive the new State Pension.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to provide all pensioners born before 6 April 1951 with the new state pension. The full new State Pension is over £200 more a month than the full basic pension. We believe this is unfair, and unjustifiable.
